nodes.text: Kalpana was a male who served as Chancellor of the Galactic Republic directly before Finis Valorum.
Kalpana was a member of an influential family allied with House Valorum.
Finis Valorum served in Kalpana's administration while still a senator. He also rode an Eddicus-class planetary shuttle that had been bugged by Senator Palpatine of Naboo.

In 44 BBY, Kalpana had received a request from Governor SonTag of Bandomeer that Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn travel to the planet and act as a Jedi representative for business concerning the Offworld Mining Corporation. However, unknown to the Chancellor, the message was forged by the Dark Jedi Xanatos to lure his former Master into a trap. It was during Kalpana's Chancellorship that the Katana fleet was built and lost, and the Stark Hyperspace War occurred later that year.
